data.oai_dc:dc: olyps of Sphenopus exilis sp. n. A. In situ image of S. exilis sp. n., polyp with no black patterns, from the type locality in Kin Bay, Okinawa, Japan on 29 October 2011. B. Polyps of NSMT-Co1576 & NSMT-Co1577 from Kin Bay, Okinawa-jima Island, Japan. The white circle points to the holotype. C. In situ image of NSMT-Co1578 from Oura Bay, Okinawa-jima Island, Japan, on 13 November 2012. Faint black patterns and bands appear on the oral disc and the tentacles. D. Polyps of lot number NSMT-Co1578 showing phenotypic variation with black stripes on the upper part of the polyps. Scale bars: 1 cm.
